mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( cash_no , member_id , cash_date , cash_kind , category_name , cash_price , cash_place , cash_memo )VALUES( #{cashNo}, #{memberId}, NOW(), #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo} )
mapper.select: SELECT cash_no cashNo, member_id memberId, cash_date cashDate, cash_kind cashKind, category_name categoryName, cash_price cashPrice, cash_place cashPlace, cash_memo cashMemo FROM cash WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE cash SET cash_kind = #{cashKind}, cash_date = NOW(), category_name = #{categoryName}, cash_price = #{cashPrice}, cash_place = #{cashPlace}, cash_memo = #{cashMemo} WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) FROM dual

SELECT cash_no cashNo, cash_kind cashKind, category_name categoryName, cash_price cashPrice, cash_place cashPlace, cash_memo cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no = #{cashNo}
